Stefanie Sycholt (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si South Africa, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Sycholt na Pretoria n'afọ 1963

Coetzee yana sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nakwa ihe nkiri na Mahadum Natal na Mahadum Cape Town. Sycholt na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi maka National Union of South African Students

Ọ chịkọtara ndị otu mmepụta AVA nke mere ihe nkiri Nelson Mandela's Welcome Home Rally na Durban na 1990. Sycholt mechara gaa Germany iji mụọ na Mahadum Television and Film Munich Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba edemede nke Mahadum nke Film na Television Munich yana onye edemede na onye nduzi.
N'afọ 2001, Sycholt mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Malunde, nke kọrọ akụkọ banyere nwa nwoke a na-akpọ Wonderboy onye na-eme enyi na onye bụbu onye agha na ọchịchị ndị ọcha

Ọ natara onyinye Avanti isii nke gụnyere onye nduzi kachasị mma, akụkụ nke uru ahụ gara na ọrụ ebere Mandela maka ụmụaka nọ n'okporo ámá. Ọ duziri ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị maka TV Gwendolyn na 2007. N'afọ 2010, o dere, duzie, ma soro mepụta Themba

Nke dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ aha ya nke Lutz van Dijk, ọ bụ ihe nkiri ezinụlọ nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwa okorobịa nwere mmasị na bọọlụ na nne ya nke butere ọrịa AIDS. Themba natara UNICEF Child Rights Award na 2010 Zanzibar International Film Festival. Sycholt duziri ọtụtụ ihe omume nke usoro Inga Lindström.
Sycholt lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onye mba Argentina ma nwee otu nwa nwoke
Ọ na-eke oge ya n'etiti Germany, Argentina, na South Africa.
